protein.specific_function: Plays a role in fertilization. Binds GTP and has GTPase activity

reference.reference_text: Lin W, Zhou X, Zhang M, Li Y, Miao S, Wang L, Zong S, Koide SS: Expression and function of the HSD-3.8 gene encoding a testis-specific protein. Mol Hum Reprod. 2001 Sep;7(9):811-8.
